qas.question: What college was the forerunner for the engineering faculty at the University of Tokyo?
What area of discipline do Japan's institutes of technology specialize in?

context: In Japan, an institute of technology (工業大学, kōgyō daigaku?) is a type of university that specializes in the <a1_0>sciences<a1_0/>. See also the <a0_0>Imperial College of Engineering<a0_0/>, which was the forerunner of the University of Tokyo's engineering faculty.
